title: Camille Roqueplan
provenance_text:
Collections Amadee Faure and A. Maroni [1]; M. Knoedler & Co., New York, NY, until February 1925; purchased by Kenneth Seaver [1877-1969], Pittsburgh, PA and Oakmont, PA, on February 3, 1925 until January 24, 1949 [2]; his gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1949.

Notes:
[1]. Information from Knoedler invoices in Note [2] below.
[2]. Purchased for $18; see invoice dated March 2, 1925 (for purchases made on February 3, 1925) in curatorial file. The invoice also includes the early provenance information. See also copy of a revised invoice from Knoedler, dated October 1, 1925, after returns of two other works that had also been purchased on February 3, 1925.
